internet_identity.build: bash -c 'test -f src/local_ii/internet_identity.wasm || mkdir src/local_ii; curl -sSL https://github.com/dfinity/internet-identity/releases/latest/download/internet_identity_dev.wasm -o src/local_ii/internet_identity.wasm;  test -f src/local_ii/internet_identity.did || curl -sSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dfinity/internet-identity/main/src/internet_identity/internet_identity.did -o src/local_ii/internet_identity.did'
